channel.title: Adding buttons in my client
channel.description: you know the report abuse button, well i want to add one that says suggestions and then a box opens up and it says at the top, enter your suggestion below, then there is a text box, and at the bottom a send box, after you hit send i want the message with the username to go to a file in my server folder. thanks so much guys

item.title: Adding buttons in my client
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

you know the report abuse button, well i want to add one that says suggestions
and then a box opens up and it says at the top, enter your suggestion below, then there is a text box, and at the bottom a send box, after you hit send i want the message with the username to go to a file in my server folder.
thanks so much guys
